ch.iserver.ace.util
Interface Lock

All Known Implementing Classes:
DocumentLock, ReentrantLock, SemaphoreLock
public interface Lock

Simple interface for locks. The interface hides the actual implementation of the lock from the application. A possible implementation could use the ReentrantLocks from the JDK or another lock implementation. Further, the actual implementation can be switched easily without affecting the client code.

Method Summary
 boolean isOwner(Thread thread)
          Determines whether the given thread is holding the lock at the moment.
 void lock()
          Grabs the lock.
 void unlock()
          Releases the lock.
